name: Sparks
description: Hi I'm Sparks! I founded Gamemode 4 in 2014 but have stepped back considerably from the project. I now leave the management to people with more time and energy, and fill in roles and help with tasks where my time allows.

name: Modulorium
description: Hello, my name is Modulo and I have been playing Minecraft since 1.6 and only fully joined the Gamemode 4 Community during Public Server 6. A few modules on the website were created by me, those being Rope Ladders and Live Catch. I joined the staff team in June 2021 and have worked on various projects since then: Obsolescence, Stanley's Summer Island Event on PS7, and the NPC's on PS9 and 10.

name: Studio Memo
description: I'm Memo (Studio Memo/miraku_memo), a digital artist bringing imagination to reality! I joined the Gamemode 4 team in 2020 and have made various works for map art, promotional material, logos, and more to come.

name: ToffeeMax
description: I make content for Gamemode 4, handle the Social Media when I remember and try edit videos. I also made some of the music for Evergrowth!

name: runcows
description: Hey, I'm runcows, but you can also just call me run. I've been playing Minecraft since beds were added, yet never really interacted with the community until recently. I joined Gamemode 4 in the aftermath of The Smithed Summit 2024, where I showcased my pack, Blossoming Pots. The staff here thought it was a perfect fit for GM4 and reached out! And now I have weekly imposter syndrome!

name: Bloo
description: When I joined Gamemode 4 in 2014, I didn't think I'd be committing to a project that's gonna keep me occupied for a decade. I made the first non-sparksian module Potion Swords on a rainy afternoon. Nowadays I take an administrative and directive role, but still dabble into module development when time allows for it.

name: Kyrius
description: I'm Kyrius! pronounced like the word 'Curious'. I joined the Gamemode 4 public server back in 2018 and our amazing community has shaped me to the person I am today! My focus in the team started off with building tasks but has blossomed into what I do now, having realized my dreams of working with Minecraft as a medium to create experiences of my own!

name: BPR02
description: I'm BPR02, also known as BPR or Beeps. I joined Gamemode 4 in 2015 after watching the GM4 Hermitcraft series and having already worked on other command block projects. Since then, I've made some of the more complex Gamemode 4 datapacks such as End Fishing, Orb of Ankou, Auto Crafting, Guidebook, and the original Sky Dimension for Public Server Sky.

name: Djones
description: I'm Djones, alternatively just "that tree" if you're low on time or my Combat Expanded module just resulted in your death. I first joined Gamemode 4 only around the end of PS1 after I wrote the wrong email and missed the invite email, which really tells you all you need to know about me. Joining the team in April 2020 as a builder I quickly made the mistake of getting into datapacks. I've since worked on various ways to torture players server events, modules, and the Obsolescence and Evergrowth maps.

name: JP12
description: I'm JP12/JP/Jeeps/Sorris Borris. I have recently only been working on backend related tasks, but if you've ever used a wormhole tank and been disappointed that it didn't teleport your enemies into space, that was me. I first heard about Gamemode 4 in 2018, and joined the server and was enamored with using lightning rods to mass eliminate shulkers. After cozying up to all the staff, I successfully infiltrated the staff team in 2021, and have been hiding inside their computers ever since.

name: Denniss
description: I'm Denniss, I joined the Gamemode 4 community during the first Public Server in 2015, and I've been part of the staff team since 2016. Since then, I've worked on various Gamemode 4 datapacks, with the most notable ones being Better Armor Stands, Chairs, and Crossbow Cartridges.

name: TheEpyonProject
description: I am TheEpyonProject, also known as Epyon or sushi. Since rejoining in PS6, I have extended my grasp to nearly every part of Gamemode 4. My notable additions are Balloon Animals, Lightning in a Bottle, and the Infinitas shamir.

name: SpecialBuilder32
description: Hi, I'm SpecialBuilder32! I'm a datapack and python developer for Gamemode 4, but I've done a little bit of everything. I officially joined the project back in 2017 when I dragged Liquid Tanks kicking and screaming out of Minecraft 1.8 and into the modern era. With most of my time being focused on University at the moment, nowadays I primarily do infrastructure and updates, though I'm excited to get back to developing new modules!

name: Misode
description: Hello, I'm Misode! I started playing on the Gamemode 4 Public Server in 2016, and in 2018 I started contributing to the modules when they moved to data packs. My main focus now is keeping data packs updated and improving our publishing workflow.

name: kruthers
description: Hello I am Kruthers! I joined Gamemode 4 close to PS1 and become a Community Moderator (remember those) in 2018. I now focus on system administration, writing many of the Gamemode 4 public server custom plugins and extinguishing the wiki when it inevitably sets itself on fire.

name: catter
description: Hi, I'm catter! I recently joined the Gamemode4 team after being inspired by their development. I got my start with datapacks when I joined Stardust Labs in 2020, where I also developed my Python skills. With my experience, I plan to contribute to many of the existing Gamemode4 modules, and potentially even make my own one day.

name: Destroyer
description: Hi there! I'm Destroyer or Des for short. I remember when GM4 was command block blobs and it's been a joy being part of this community. I started my datapackery in Stardust Labs where I learned worldgen and basic function knowledge. I will be taking part in project development, helping to create awesome experiences with the rest of the gm4 team.

name: rednls
description: Hey! I'm rednls or just red. I began learning datapacks mid-November 2023, resource packs 6 months after, and then joined the team in August 2024. Since then, I've been absorbed into Smithed to help with a Summit and Direct- as well as participated in a few mapjams (one of which I won!). Moving forward- I'd love to continue creating enjoyable maps and experiences, whether or not I actually finish them :3c

name: TheSneakingSpider
description: Hi, I'm TheSneakingSpider -- not an actual spider, but close enough! I've been a part of the Gamemode 4 Community for a long time before joining the team to take more of an active role. As a part of the  team I help with map & project development, whether it is something for our public testing server or another map of ours, I get my eight hands to help wherever needed.

name: Sheepe
description: Hi, I'm Sheepe. I've been involved in Gamemode 4 since the second public server. Now I primarily work on datapacks, with special attention to those with complex maths.

name: Lune
description: Hi, I'm Lune! I just joined the team at the end of 2025 to help out with the public server. I've been playing Minecraft since alpha. I also do digital art. I will likely be dedicated to moderation and various creative tasks.

name: TransportLayer
description: You can call me Transport or TL! I first joined the team to work on the secret PSIV project (AKA Gamemode 4D) and stayed as a sysadmin/server dev through PSV before rejoining during PS11! I also set up the Gamemode 4 Wiki and helped migrate away from Fandom. While most of my work is on the backend, I love to help out with moderation and just hang out on the server!

name: Hero
description: Hello, I'm Hero. Iâ€™ve been playing on the Gamemode 4 server since PSIII (after missing my initial acceptance for PSII) and got pretty involved in the community. Because of some internet issues, I ended up playing off and on across various servers (aside from some serious playtime on the first Skyblock server). I've helped on the wiki a little bit with GIFs, and I'm excited to help make sure the server I've loved for years stays a fun and inviting place for everyone.

name: Jesse
description: Hey, I go by Jesse and my pronouns are They/Them. Yes, my username is a dinosaur and a penguin mix! I'm new around here but if I have an opinion then I'll get involved in any project.. like taking on the furniture module oops. Outside of this I'm probably most well known being a mental health advocate as I have BPD among other things :D I look forward to meeting you on the public server!
